name: _arcuswarp
description:
Ludum Dare 48 submission - arcuswarp!

_arcuswarp is an arcadey bullet hell shoot-em-up game. The initial, fully playable prototype was finished in under 48 hours and submitted to the jam.

CONTROLS:

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Fire

Right Hold: Bullet Time

Right Click: Warp

1-2-3 Keys: Change Weapons (Machine Gun, Rocket Launcher, Rail Gun)
